targets.Name: Chefbear
targets.bannerText: Chef Bear only has one hand on the steering wheel.
postText: It is important for the driver to keep both hands on the steering wheel so they can be ready to change the direction in which they're driving if they need to.
It is important for the driver to keep both hands on the steering wheel so they can be ready to change the direction in which they're driving if they need to.
targets.hint: I'm soft but shed all over
Text: FURRY PET (Ex: Dogs, Cats, Hamsters, Guinea Pigs, and Rabbits) are common pet allergens that can trigger asthma symptoms in some people.Pet hair and dander, especially cat hair, can fly in the air and land on surfaces throughout the house...
